description.value: This zombie fights just as well on the ground as it does standing. While @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], the zombie isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed], it ignores the status penalty to its attack rolls, and it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip]. The zombie can also move up to half its Speed when it Crawls.
